name: Maze Fantasy
description:
Maze Fantasy is a wonderful puzzle game !

You are a small wizard and must collect all green crystals in 50 levels !

Maze Fantasy is not a simple pacman game: you will discover after the first levels a lot of things ! In addition you have the right to great cutscenes in 3D!

This game was created for the site beecolor.com

This is the flash version exported for PC.

No install, just unzip the file and launch the .exe
